channel.title: Turn Pk Off?

item.title: Turn Pk Off?
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

How would i turn this command into a command that puts pk places off?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("nopk") && connectedFrom.equals("localhost")) { } }

How would i turn this command into a command that puts pk on?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkon") && connectedFrom.equals("localhost")) { } }

If i need to add something special like boolen or w.e please send me thnx.

Thanks, Jack.

Read full topic
